name: Study Hall
description: A quiet space with individual desks and ample natural light, perfect for focused study.

name: Collaboration Room
description: A spacious room with tables and chairs, ideal for brainstorming and team projects.

name: Lecture Hall
description: A large room with tiered seating and audio-visual equipment, suitable for lectures and presentations.

name: Computer Lab
description: A room equipped with computers and software, perfect for research and digital work.

name: Meeting Room
description: A well-equipped room with a conference table and chairs, ideal for meetings and discussions.

name: Reading Room
description: A comfortable space with armchairs and soft lighting, perfect for curling up with a good book.

name: Art Studio
description: A bright room with easels, paints, and other art supplies, ideal for unleashing your creativity.

name: Music Room
description: A soundproofed room with instruments and equipment, perfect for practicing or jamming with friends.

name: Auditorium
description: A large stage and seating area, ideal for hosting presentations, performances, and other events.

name: Open Space
description: A versatile space with movable furniture and whiteboards, perfect for workshops, meetings, or just hanging out.
